naslov: Villa sa bazenom – panoramski pogled na more - Podstrana (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji prekrasne Ville sa grijanim bazenom u Podstrani. Ova ljepotica je izgrađena na tri etaže, a okružuje je jedinstvena okućnica sa popratnim sadržajem (2 mini golf igrališta, dječje igralište, vrt i dovoljno mjesta za parking više automobila.). Potpuno je opremljena i provedeno je centralno grijanje i postavljeni su solarni paneli. Prizemlje – se sastoji od moderno i potpuno opremljenog dvosobnog apartmana 80m2 koji ima dvije spavaće sobe, sobu(igraonicu za djecu), dnevni boravak spojen sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom, kupatilo sa wc-om, teretana, sauna sa parnim tušem, spremišta, garaža, unutarnji kamin, vanjski kamin, prostor za prigodne večere za veći broj ljudi i grijani bazen s mlaznim mlazom i hidromasažom. Prvi kat - se sastoji od moderno i potpuno opremljenog četverosobnog apartmana 130m2 koji ima četiri spavaće sobe, dnevni boravak spojen sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom, dva kupatila sa wc-om, balkon i terasu sa pogledom na more. Drugi kat - se sastoji od moderno i potpuno opremljenog četverosobnog apartmana 130m2 koji ima četiri spavaće sobe, dnevni boravak spojen sa blagovaonom i kuhinjom, dva kupatila sa wc-om balkon i terasu na južnoj strani sa panoramskim pogledom na more. Lokacija ove nekretnine je na uzvisini svega 350m od mora i nalazi se u mirnom okruženju sa malo susjednih kuća i dosta zelenih površina. Parcela je veličine 550m2, a uz manju nadoplatu može se proširiti na 1300m2. Ova nekretnina predstavlja odličnu investiciju jer je u uhodanom najmu punu sezonu počevši od 01.04. a ujedno može biti odlično mjesto za življenje u miru i tišini blizu mora i grada Splita. Vlasništvo je uredno. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Villa with pool - panoramic sea view - Podstrana We mediate the sale of a beautiful villa with a heated pool in Podstrana. This beauty is built on three floors, and is surrounded by a unique garden with accompanying content (2 mini golf courses, a children's playground, a garden and enough parking space for several cars.). It is fully equipped with central heating and installed solar panels. Ground floor - consists of a modern and fully equipped two-room apartment of 80 m2, which has two bedrooms, a room (playroom for children), a living room connected to the dining room and kitchen, a bathroom with a toilet, a gym, a sauna with a steam shower, storage rooms, a garage, an indoor fireplace, an outdoor fireplace, an area for special dinners for a larger number of people and a heated pool with a jet stream and hydromassage. The first floor - consists of a modern and fully equipped four-room apartment of 130 m2 with four bedrooms, a living room connected to the dining room and kitchen, two bathrooms with a toilet, a balcony and a terrace with a view of the sea. The second floor - consists of a modern and fully equipped four-room apartment of 130 m2 with four bedrooms, a living room connected to the dining room and kitchen, two bathrooms with a toilet, a balcony and a terrace on the south side with a panoramic view of the sea. The location of this property is on a hill only 350m from the sea and is located in a quiet environment with few neighboring houses and plenty of green areas. The plot is 550m2 in size and can be extended to 1300m2 for a small fee. This property is an excellent investment because it is leased for a full season starting from April 1. and at the same time it can be a great place to live in peace and quiet close to the sea and the city of Split. The property is neat. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: 00385915615115 ŽELJANA
